entry.title: Cinnamon Raisin Bagels
entry.summary:
Makes 8 bagels
Ingredients
1 2/3 cups flour 1 tsp. salt 1 1/2 tbsp. cinnamon 2 1/2 tsp. yeast 1 cup warm water 3 tbsp brown sugar, divided 2/3 cup seedless raisins
Directions
Whisk together flour, salt and cinnamon. Whisk together yeast, water, and 2 tbsp. brown sugar. Let proof for 5 minutes. Add flour mixture and mix for 5-10 minutes. Knead in raisins by hand on f...

entry.title: Sourdough Sandwich Loaf
entry.summary:
Makes 2 loaves
Ingredients
1 1/4 cups water (10 ounces) 1 1/2 tsp. yeast 2 cups ripe sourdough starter (16 ounces) 4 to 4 1/2 cups all-purpose flour 1 tbsp. kosher salt
Directions
Combine water and yeast, let dissolve. Stir in sourdough starter until mostly dissolved (a few string bits are ok). Add 4 cups and the salt, and stir to make a shaggy dough. Knead tht dough for 8 ...

entry.title: Banana Bread
entry.summary:
Makes one loaf.
Ingredients
2 cups wheat flour with nutmeg added 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1 1/2 tsp baking powder 1/2 tsp. baking soda 2 egss 2-3 mashed bannanas 1/2 cup sugar 2 tbsp. brown sugar 1/2 cup butter, melted and cooled to room temperature 1/4 cup sour cream with 2 tsp. oil
Directions
Mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, and cinnamon in a small bowl. Set aside....

entry.title: White Sandwich Bread
entry.summary:
Makes one loaf.
Ingredients
3 1/4 cup flour (sift and level when measuring) add more as needed (210 + 210 - 250g or more) 1 1/4 tsp. salt (8g) 2 1/4 tsp. yeast (one packet) (5g) 2 tbsp. sugar (28g) 1 3/8 cup warm water (325mL) 2 tbsp. oil
Directions
Combine 1 1/2 cup of the four, salt, yeast and sugar. Add the water and oil and mix until combined. Mixture will be thi...

entry.title: Danish Oat Loaf
entry.summary:
Makes two 8-inch loaves.
Ingredients
1 cup uncooked rolled oats. 1 cup milk, heated to boiling 2 tbsp. butter 1/4 cup brown sugar 1 tsp. salt 2 tsp. active dry yeast 1 1/4 cup lukewarm water 4-5 cups flour
Topping:
1 beaten egg 2 tbsp. milk rolled oats
Directions
